themes: lack of clear communication about application periods
difficulty navigating the City of Austin website
inaccessibility of funding opportunities for newcomers
need for equitable access to information
key_phrases: Information about when the next application period opens up is not clearly posted
the COA website is clunky and hard to navigate
these opportunities for funding need to be accessible to everyone
a lot of folks starting out never hear about them
solutions_proposed: make funding opportunities accessible to everyone
improve clarity and posting of application period information
